summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 61st Street, from 20th Avenue Northwest to a point two hundred (200) feet east of 21st Avenue Northeast, and 21st Avenue Northeast, from East 61st Street to the alley between East 62nd Street and East 63rd Street, by grading the same and constructing concrete walks thereon, and authorizing and directing the Mayor and City Comptroller to sign a petition therefor.
